description: This Java source file defines the class EventJavaCodeProducer, which extends EventCodeProducer. The class is responsible for generating Java code related to events and enums within a larger code generation framework. It includes methods for creating Java classes, interfaces, event codes, listeners, and adapters based on templates and parsed wrappers. The class interacts with other components such as Processor, Context, and various Wrapper objects to produce source files and manage code dependencies, especially for event-driven functionalities.

classes.name: EventJavaCodeProducer
classes.description: Main class responsible for generating Java code related to events and enums. It handles creating files from templates, managing dependencies, and generating code files for events, enums, listeners, and adapters within a code generation framework.

methods.name: generate
methods.description: Main method that orchestrates the code generation process for Java event and enum classes, including dependencies and related files.

methods.name: generateWrapperFile
methods.description: Generates individual Java source files for a given wrapper, including event classes, enums, listeners, and adapters.

methods.name: generateWrapperBuffer
methods.description: Creates the source code buffer for a specific wrapper, applying templates and mappings for a Java class, enum, or related component.

methods.name: createEventCodesFile
methods.description: Generates the Java interface containing event code constants.

methods.name: createEventListenerFile
methods.description: Creates the Java source file for the event listener class based on a template.

methods.name: createEventAdapterFile
methods.description: Creates the Java source file for the event adapter class based on a template.

methods.name: formatEventCodes
methods.description: Formats a list of event code definitions into Java syntax using a code formatter.

methods.name: assignNames
methods.description: Assigns class name, package, and filename to a wrapper based on its variable, if not already generated.

methods.name: getEventCodesInterfaceName
methods.description: Constructs the name of the event codes interface, optionally fully qualified.
